StyleWriter's Features 

Unique Proofreading & Editing Software - StyleWriter's editing advice shows you how to transform your writing into clear, concise and professional writing style. 

Unique Jargon BusterÃ¢â€žÂ¢ Editing - StyleWriter highlights jargon phrases, difficult words and acronyms and abbreviations to help you write in a jargon-free style.
